channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: North Carolina's new Democratic governor pledges to rebuild after Helene, work with GOP
item.description: North Carolina Gov. Josh Stein kicked off his term in office Saturday by praising the resilience of the state's residents following Hurricane Helene a...

item.title: Heinous Transit Crimes Recall Dark Days of Gotham
item.description: The party that aggressively pushes public transit over cars should do its utmost to ensure passengers are safe.

item.title: Jan. 6 prisoner advocates preparing for mass commutations by Trump on Inauguration Day
item.description: A Jan. 6 prisoners advocacy organization is now preparing for the mass release of all incarcerated Jan. 6 defendants when President-elect Donald Trump...

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith resigns from DOJ amid fight to block report against Trump
item.description: Special counsel Jack Smith resigned from the Justice Department on Friday, bookending his legal saga against President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: ‘Jake Tapper’s Lead-In Did That’: Editor Takes The Stand To Defend Allegedly Defamatory CNN Report On Navy Vet
item.description: CNN editor Fuzz Hogan took the stand Friday to defend his outlet and their allegedly defamatory report about a U.S. Navy veteran.

item.title: Newsom invites Trump to California, urges against politicizing 'human tragedy,' disseminating 'disinformation'
item.description: As fires rage, California Gov. Gavin Newsom invited President-elect Trump to visit the state, urging against politicization of the catastrophe.

item.title: A Sorry President
item.description: In trying to block Trump’s return, Biden made it inevitable.

item.title: Pence reveals words exchanged with President-elect Trump at Carter funeral
item.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence recently revealed the words he exchanged with President-elect Trump at the funeral for late President Carter.

item.title: Lillie Bliss, MoMA’s Unheralded Founder, Gets a Close Look
item.description: She was one of three women who created the museum, and her gifts of art and money still make a difference after 90 years.

item.title: Greenland's prime minister 'ready to talk' with Trump
item.description: Greenland's Prime Minister Mute Egede said he's ready for a dialogue with President-elect Donald Trump, who wants America to gain control of the world...

item.title: ‘Disgrace To The System’: Trump Slams Democrat Lawfare As Show Trial Sputters To An End
item.description: When a New York judge sentenced Trump to 'unconditional discharge,' the former president slammed Democrat lawfare.

item.title: Dem senator warns 'LA fires are preview of coming atrocities,' claims Trump bought off by 'Big Oil'
item.description: Sen. Ed Markey, D-Mass., claims President-elect Trump was bought off by "Big Oil" and that "the LA fires are preview of coming atrocities."

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith resigns after 2-year stint at Department of Justice

item.title: Judge Issues Weird Sentence In Pennsylvania Voter Fraud Case
item.description: The case exposes a flaw in Pennsylvania’s voter integrity rules that allows one person to have more than one vote.

item.title: An Alternative to Buying Greenland That Could Actually Work
item.description: Trump can use Greenland’s national interests to leverage a deal that gives him almost everything he wants. Here’s how.

item.title: While California Burns, Gavin Newsom Begs Biden To Silence ‘Disinformation’
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom asked Biden to help silence 'mis- and disinformation' as wildfire spread across Los Angeles.
